author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ping An Insurance Group Co Of China Says Stock Exchange Confirms Proposed Spin-Off & Listing Of Unit​
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Ping An Insurance Group Co Of China Ltd :
* APPLIED TO STOCK EXCHANGE TO APPROVE PROPOSED SPIN-OFF & SEPARATE LISTING OF PING AN HEALTHCARE & TECHNOLOGY
* ‍STOCK EXCHANGE HAS CONFIRMED THAT COMPANY MAY PROCEED WITH PROPOSED SPIN-OFF AND LISTING​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
